caption:
The next time you're in New Orleans, be sure to stay at the Hubbard Mansion owned by Mr. Don! #BlackOwned ⁠
⁠
"I met Mr. Don, owner of Hubbard Mansion in New Orleans, in April while speaking at Dillard University. The moment I arrived for my stay, he opened the door and told me he knew my name and why I was there. He proceeded to tell me the history of where I was at, ensuring I knew I was at the epicenter of Black history’s past, present, and future (and that it was up to me to carry the baton). He gave me so many gems and knowledge, and by the end of the stay he told me I’m his new honorary granddaughter 😭" - @imyagirleva⁠
⁠
Follow @officialblackwallstreet for more Black excellence and Black-owned businesses.
